body:
Alright Russ, I will reproduce that tomorrow and send you a step by step
guide for it.

Thanks,
Roman

On Mon, Jan 4, 2016 at 10:11 PM, Russ Cox <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> To fix this, I need to be able to reproduce it. I cannot reproduce it from
> your description. At the least I would need to know the full path to the
> source file containing the bad import and the full text of the source line
> containing the bad import.
